name: rainscare-full-stack
description: Complete Rainscare application with backend, frontend, and admin panel

scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:admin: cd admin && npm install && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:client && npm run build:admin
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install

author: Rainscare Team
